title: Unlocking the Pythagorean Theorem
description: An educational video explaining the Pythagorean Theorem, from its historical origins to visual proofs and real-world applications, using animated diagrams and step-by-step demonstrations.

scenes.title: Introduction to Pythagoras and the Theorem
scenes.description: Introduce Pythagoras, the ancient Greek mathematician, and state the theorem clearly.
narrative_beats: Who was Pythagoras and his contributions to mathematics.
State the theorem: In a right triangle, the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
Explain key terms: right triangle, hypotenuse, legs.
visual_ideas: Display a timeline showing Pythagoras' era with Text labels.
Show a right triangle with labeled sides using Triangle and Text.
Animate the appearance of the equation: MathTex(r"a^2 + b^2 = c^2").

scenes.title: Visual Proof with Squares
scenes.description: Demonstrate the theorem visually by constructing squares on each side of a right triangle.
narrative_beats: Draw a right triangle and build squares on each side.
Rearrange the squares from the legs to fit into the hypotenuse square.
Show how the areas match, proving the theorem.
visual_ideas: Create a right triangle with Square objects on each side.
Use FadeIn and Transform animations to rearrange the smaller squares.
Highlight area equivalence with color changes and Text overlays.

scenes.title: Step-by-Step Calculation Example
scenes.description: Work through a numerical example to calculate the hypotenuse using the theorem.
narrative_beats: Present a sample right triangle with given leg lengths.
Apply the formula step by step: substitute values, calculate squares, sum them.
Verify the result by squaring the hypotenuse.
visual_ideas: Show a Triangle with labeled lengths (e.g., a=3, b=4).
Display MathTex equations progressively: MathTex(r"3^2 + 4^2 = 9 + 16 = 25"), then MathTex(r"5^2 = 25").
Animate the calculation steps with Write animations.

scenes.title: Real-World Applications
scenes.description: Explore practical uses of the Pythagorean Theorem in everyday life and fields like engineering.
narrative_beats: Discuss distance calculation in navigation or construction.
Show an example: finding the distance between two points.
Highlight its role in architecture, such as roof design.
visual_ideas: Illustrate a coordinate plane with points and a right triangle using Graph and Line.
Demonstrate a ladder against a wall scenario with Triangle and measurements.
Use Text and icons for applications like maps or buildings.

scenes.title: Conclusion and Extensions
scenes.description: Summarize the theorem's importance and mention related concepts like the Pythagorean triples.
narrative_beats: Recap the theorem and its proof.
Introduce Pythagorean triples as special integer solutions.
visual_ideas: Fade in a summary Text with the theorem equation.
Show a table of triples using Tex for formatting.
End with a geometric pattern or spiral related to Pythagoras.
